name: sales-performance-dashboard
description: Enterprise-grade Sales Performance Dashboard MicroSaaS with real-time analytics and AI forecasting

scripts.dev: docker-compose up -d && concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.setup: npm run setup:deps && npm run setup:db
scripts.setup:deps: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.setup:db: docker-compose up -d postgres redis timescaledb && sleep 10 && npm run db:migrate

author: Sales Performance Dashboard Team
